verses.verse: Woe <S%H480><s%> is me! for I am as when they have gathered <S%H625><s%> the summer fruits <S%H7019><s%>, as the grapegleanings <S%H5955><s%> of the vintage <S%H1210><s%>: there is no cluster <S%H811><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: my soul <S%H5315><s%> desired <S%H183><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the firstripe fruit <S%H1063><s%>.

The good <S%H2623><s%> man is perished <S%H6><s%> <S%H8804><s%> out of the earth <S%H776><s%>: and there is none upright <S%H3477><s%> among men <S%H120><s%>: they all lie in wait <S%H693><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for blood <S%H1818><s%>; they hunt <S%H6679><s%> <S%H8799><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> with a net <S%H2764><s%>.

That they may do evil <S%H7451><s%> with both hands <S%H3709><s%> earnestly <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, the prince <S%H8269><s%> asketh <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and the judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%> asketh for a reward <S%H7966><s%>; and the great <S%H1419><s%> man, he uttereth <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his mischievous <S%H1942><s%> desire <S%H5315><s%>: so they wrap it up <S%H5686><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.

The best <S%H2896><s%> of them is as a brier <S%H2312><s%>: the most upright <S%H3477><s%> is sharper than a tshofar hedge <S%H4534><s%>: the day <S%H3117><s%> of thy watchmen <S%H6822><s%> <S%H8764><s%> and thy visitation <S%H6486><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; now shall be their perplexity <S%H3998><s%>.

Trust <S%H539><s%> <S%H8686><s%> ye not in a friend <S%H7453><s%>, put ye not confidence <S%H982><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in a guide <S%H441><s%>: keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the doors <S%H6607><s%> of thy mouth <S%H6310><s%> from her that lieth <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in thy bosom <S%H2436><s%>.

For the son <S%H1121><s%> dishonoureth <S%H5034><s%> <S%H8764><s%> the father <S%H1><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> riseht up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8801><s%> against her mother <S%H517><s%>, the daughter in Torah <S%H3618><s%> against her mother in Torah <S%H2545><s%>; a man's <S%H376><s%> enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> are the men <S%H582><s%> of his own house <S%H1004><s%>.

Therefore I will look <S%H6822><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>; I will wait <S%H3176><s%> <S%H8686><s%> for the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of my salvation <S%H3468><s%>: my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> will hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me.

Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not against me, O mine enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: when I fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, I shall arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; when I sit <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in darkness <S%H2822><s%>, the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall be a light <S%H216><s%> unto me.

I will bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the indignation <S%H2197><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, because I have sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against him, until he plead <S%H7378><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my cause <S%H7379><s%>, and execute <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> for me: he will bring me forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to the light <S%H216><s%>, and I shall behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

Then she that is mine enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, and shame <S%H955><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> her which said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto me, Where is the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>? mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her: now shall she be trodden down <S%H4823><s%> as the mire <S%H2916><s%> of the streets <S%H2351><s%>.
In the day <S%H3117><s%> that thy walls <S%H1447><s%> are to be built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, in that day <S%H3117><s%> shall the decree <S%H2706><s%> be far removed <S%H7368><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> also he shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> even to thee from Ashur <S%H804><s%>, and from the fortified <S%H4693><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>, and from the fortress <S%H4693><s%> even to the river <S%H5104><s%>, and from sea <S%H3220><s%> to sea <S%H3220><s%>, and from mountain <S%H2022><s%> to mountain <S%H2022><s%>.
Notwithstanding the land <S%H776><s%> shall be desolate <S%H8077><s%> because of them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> therein, for the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of their doings <S%H4611><s%>.

Feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> with thy rod <S%H7626><s%>, the flock <S%H6629><s%> of thine heritage <S%H5159><s%>, which dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8802><s%> solitarily <S%H910><s%> in the wood <S%H3293><s%>, in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Karmel <S%H3760><s%>: let them feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%> and Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>, as in the days <S%H3117><s%> of old <S%H5769><s%>.

According to the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy coming <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will I shew <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto him marvellous <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8737><s%> things.

The nations <S%H1471><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and be confounded <S%H954><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at all their might <S%H1369><s%>: they shall lay <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their hand <S%H3027><s%> upon their mouth <S%H6310><s%>, their ears <S%H241><s%> shall be deaf <S%H2790><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

They shall lick <S%H3897><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> like a serpent <S%H5175><s%>, they shall move <S%H7264><s%> <S%H8799><s%> out of their holes <S%H4526><s%> like worms <S%H2119><s%> <S%H8801><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>: they shall be afraid <S%H6342><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and shall fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> because of thee.

Who is a 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> like unto thee, that pardoneth <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and passeht by <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the transgression <S%H6588><s%> of the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of his heritage <S%H5159><s%>? he retaineth <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8689><s%> not his anger <S%H639><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>, because he delighteth <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in mercy <S%H2617><s%>.

He will turn again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, he will have compassion <S%H7355><s%> <S%H8762><s%> upon us; he will subdue <S%H3533><s%> <S%H8799><s%> our iniquities <S%H5771><s%>; and thou wilt cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all their sins <S%H2403><s%> into the depths <S%H4688><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

Thou wilt perform <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the truth <S%H571><s%> to Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, and the mercy <S%H2617><s%> to Avraham <S%H85><s%>, which thou hast sworn <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto our fathers <S%H1><s%> from the days <S%H3117><s%> of old <S%H6924><s%>.
